mapper.update: UPDATE notice SET notice_title=#{noticeTitle}, update_id=#{updateId}, update_time=now() WHERE notice_id = #{noticeId}
mapper.insert: INSERT INTO notice (notice_title, notice_file, creat_id, create_time, update_id, update_time) VALUE (#{noticeTitle}, #{noticeFile}, #{creatId}, now(), creat_id, create_time)
